General.Name: Lexibook Linguistic Electronic System SA
General.Description: Lexibook - Linguistic Electronic System Société anonyme designs and markets electronic leisure products for the children in France. It offers tablets, toys, laptops, alarm clocks, weather stations, calculators/stationery, translators/dictionaries, and accessories, as well as audio, video, photo, and music products; and role-playing games. The company sells its products under the Lexibook, Decotech, iParty, Yeno, Powerman, and other brands. It operates various trademarks, including Touchman, Digital Emotions, TravelMachine, Interactive for all, Meteoclock, Serenity, Lexibook, and others. The company was founded in 1981 and is headquartered in Les Ulis, France.
General.Address: 6, Avenue des Andes, Les Ulis, France, 91940
